org.lwjgl.util.tinyfd - package org.lwjgl.util.tinyfd
Contains bindings to tiny file dialogs.

If you pass "tinyfd_query" as aTitle, the functions will not display the dialogs but will fill tinyfd_response with the retain solution and return:

tinyfd_version - Static variable in class org.lwjgl.util.tinyfd.TinyFileDialogs
The library version.
TinyFileDialogs - Class in org.lwjgl.util.tinyfd
Bindings to tiny file dialogs, a native dialog library with support for: message / question input / password save file open file & multiple files select folder color picker
